alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 2:01PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central El Paso County through 230 PM MDT... At 201 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Manitou Springs, or near Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colorado Springs, Manitou Springs, Stratmoor, Peterson AFB, Cimarron Hills and Fort Carson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
